items.title: Environmental Conservation Program:
items.content: ACI offers immersive internships at biological stations for university students from around the world.

items.title: Practical Experience:
items.content: Participants acquire knowledge and skills in conservation through biomonitoring activities and environmental projects.

items.title: Professional Mentoring:
items.content: Students receive guidance and support from experts in the field of conservation.

items.title: Impact on Rural Communities:
items.content: ACI promotes sustainable development and supports local communities by creating jobs and financing community projects.

items.title: Personal and Professional Development:
items.content: Students improve their skills, build professional networks and make a significant contribution to environmental stewardship.

items.title: Internationalization:
items.content: ACI facilitates global collaboration and the integration of knowledge from diverse cultures and disciplines.

students.title: Students
students.description: ACI provides internships in biology and environmental sciences that promote sustainable local development. Students not only gain technical knowledge but also contribute to the progress and well-being of communities.

generalPublic.title: General Public
generalPublic.description: ACI offers nature immersion experiences during holiday periods. We invite everyone to join guided tours, workshops, and volunteering, a unique opportunity to enjoy and conserve nature.

companies.title: Companies
companies.description: ACI enables companies to book natural experiences for employees during internships. It promotes CSR and educates on environmental conservation and climate change.
